Name Rascal/Expressions/Values/List/slice

Function list[&T] slice(list[&T] lst, int start, int len) throws IndexOutOfBounds(int index)
Description Returns a sublist of lst from index start of length len.
Examples 
rascal>import List;
ok
rascal>slice([10, 20, 30, 40, 50, 60], 2, 3);
list[int]: [30,40,50]
